marketing_product_consistency.title: Consistent Product Launch Kit
marketing_product_consistency.brief: Hero shot for eco-friendly skincare serum placed on reflective mineral slab, morning dew atmosphere, include tagline slot top-right.
notes: Use Custom Characters/Objects for the hero bottle before running the case.
After generation, duplicate variants with Reimagine to build the full product carousel.
Finalize typography and CTA zones inside the Freepik editor.

tipografia_evento.title: Festival Poster With Typographic Hierarchy
tipografia_evento.brief: Poster for 'Luz e Som Festival 2026', dominant headline centered, secondary acts listed along left column, neon magenta and electric blue palette, stage lasers in background, 16:9 format.
notes: Prioritize text instructions in Atmosphere and Intent - SeaDream handles typography edits well.
Use Colors panel to fine-tune the neon palette after the base render.
Check kerning and alignment with Retouch commands if necessary.

storyboard_exploracao.title: Exploratory Storyboard, 6 Frames
storyboard_exploracao.brief: Mini series following a bio-luminescent diver exploring submerged sci-fi ruins, emphasize evolving light color per frame, maintain protagonist silhouette consistency.
notes: Leverage Reimagine batching to spin up all six frames quickly.
Track color script changes in Notes to synchronize post-production.
Upscale final selections to 4K for presentation reels.

arquitetura_pavilhao_lux.title: Architectural Pavilion at Golden Hour
arquitetura_pavilhao_lux.brief: Exterior render of a modular cultural pavilion with parametric wood fins and glass curtain walls, golden hour lighting, include pedestrian flow and soft signage placeholders.
notes: Utilize Composition to reserve areas for wayfinding graphics before generation.
After the base render, detail material highlights via Retouch to emphasize wood grain.
Generate an alternate nighttime variant with Reimagine for presentation boards.

stand_imersivo_tech.title: Immersive Tech Booth Experience
stand_imersivo_tech.brief: Trade show booth for a spatial computing brand, central holographic demo zone, interactive pillars along the sides, cyan and amber accent lighting, include overhead signage frame.
notes: Start with a wide composition and crop variants later inside the Freepik editor.
Use Custom Objects for branded hardware before running the preset.
Plan follow-up shots with close-ups using the same prompt in Seedream's edit mode.
